typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{CustomReportRosters.PipelineRunId} as string,
		{CustomReportRosters.PipelineTriggerTime} as string,
		amount as double,
		createdByUser as string,
		createdDate as string,
		date as string,
		employeeId as string,
		employmentType as string,
		end as string,
		firstName as string,
		lastName as string,
		modifiedByUser as string,
		modifiedDate as string,
		paramOrganizationId as string,
		paramRosterId as string,
		quantity as double,
		room as string,
		rosterEntryId as string,
		rosterId as string,
		serviceCode as string,
		start as string,
		varRosterDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SourceBlobDefinitiv
SourceBlobDefinitiv derive(date = toDate(date),
		createdDate = toDate(createdDate),
		modifiedDate = toDate(modifiedDate)) ~> CastDateType
CastDateType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: 'container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1',
	rejectedData_folderPath: 'ds_adsl2_stnidoprodeastau100_csv',
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: false,
	mapColumn(
		PipelineRunId = {CustomReportRosters.PipelineRunId},
		PipelineTriggerTime = {CustomReportRosters.PipelineTriggerTime},
		amount,
		createdByUser,
		createdDate,
		date,
		employeeId,
		employmentType,
		end,
		firstName,
		lastName,
		modifiedByUser,
		modifiedDate,
		paramOrganizationId,
		paramRosterId,
		quantity,
		room,
		rosterEntryId,
		rosterId,
		serviceCode,
		start,
		varRosterDate,
		SourceFileName
	)) ~> SinkDefinitivSql
